gdprConsent:
We use cookies to securely identify your account and keep you signed in.

We use Google analytics to improve the product and troubleshoot customer issues.

A customer may withdraw their consent and delete their data at any time by deleting their account via the account settings menu.

noType.explainChannels: A channel on YouTube is the home page for an account. You can follow as many as you want. Look for the Channel tag in the search results!

noType.explainPlaylists: A Playlist is a group of videos on users' YouTube channels, listed in a particular way so you can quickly find content that interests you. Look for the Playlist tag in the search results!
